main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in South Bend, Indiana during 1957.
interesting points: Witnesses described observing a bright, elongated object traveling at high speed,The object was reported to be approximately 300-400 feet in length and emitted a bright light,The sightings were reported over multiple nights with various witnesses including civilians and an officer,Some objects were described as oval-shaped with flame or light enveloping them,Several witnesses reported the objects' movements as smooth and fast, with sudden changes in direction.
sighted object: bright, elongated and oval-shaped objects in the sky
witness description: Civilians including Mrs. ###### and Officer Blaine McCaskey; a 16-year-old son and a 15-year-old daughter were also witnesses.
